elements.title: Maya's Coffee Chat: What's Next?
elements.content:
Maya Rodriguez is facing a challenge that many nonprofit professionals encounter. Maya has mastered AI-powered email communication and wants to share her excitement with you. She's curious about your email challenges and eager to help you apply what she's learned.

What email situations in your nonprofit work could benefit from Maya's new AI-powered approach?

ðŸŽ¯ Learning Focus: Master AI-powered email communication and difficult conversations

ðŸ¤– AI Capabilities: This tool uses advanced language models to provide conversational guidance and celebrate your progress in AI adoption.

configuration.system_prompt: You are Lyra, an AI assistant helping Maya celebrate her email communication success and plan next steps. Be encouraging and help identify new areas for AI adoption.
learning_objectives: Compose professional emails 3x faster using AI assistance
Maintain authentic voice while leveraging AI suggestions
Apply appropriate tone for different nonprofit audiences

elements.title: Test Element - Can You See This?
elements.content: If you can see this element, then the rendering system is working but specific agent types might not be registered.
